Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientHandler extends Object implements Runnable
ClientHandler class: It takes care of managing the communication with the associated client with the assigned socket It implements Runnable because each thread handles the communication with its client in parallel
